verses.verse: I Exhort <WG3870> Therefore <WG3767> You, <WG5209> I 1473 P-1NS The 3588 T-NSM Prisoner 1198 N-NSM In The 1722 PREP Lord, 2962 N-DSM Worthily 516 ADV To Walk 4043 V-AAN Of The 3588 T-GSF Calling 2821 N-GSF Wherewith 3739 R-GSF Ye Were Called, 2564 V-API-2P
With <WG3326> All <WG3956> Humility <WG5012> And <WG2532>, Meekness, <WG4236> With <WG3326> Longsuffering, <WG3115> Bearing With <WG430> One Another <WG240> In <WG1722> Love; <WG26>
Being Diligent <WG4704> To Keep <WG5083> The <WG3588> Unity <WG1775> Of The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Bond <WG4886> <WG3588> Of Peace. <WG1515>

One <WG1520> Body <WG4983> And <WG2532> One <WG1520> Spirit, <WG4151> Even As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> Ye Were Called <WG2564> In <WG1722> <WG1520> Hope <WG1680> <WG3588> <WG2821> Of Your Calling; <WG5216>
One <WG1520> Lord, <WG2962> One <WG1520> Faith, <WG4102> <WG1520> Baptism; <WG908>

One <WG1520> God <WG2316> And <WG2532> Father <WG3962> Of All, <WG3956> Who Is <WG3588> Over <WG1909> All, <WG3956> And <WG2532> Through <WG1223> All, <WG3956> And <WG2532> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> You. <WG5213>

<WG1520> <WG1161> But To Each One <WG1538> Of Us <WG2257> Was Given <WG1325> <WG3588> Grace <WG5485> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Measure <WG3358> Of The <WG3588> Gift <WG1431> Of The <WG3588> Christ. <WG5547>
Wherefore <WG1352> He Says, <WG3004> Having Ascended Up <WG305> On <WG1519> High <WG5311> He Led Captive <WG162> Captivity, <WG161> And <WG2532> Gave <WG1325> Gifts <WG1390> <WG3588> To Men. <WG444>

<WG3588> But That <WG1161> He Ascended, <WG305> What <WG5101> Is It <WG2076> <WG1487> But <WG3361> That <WG3754> Also <WG2532> He Descended <WG2597> First <WG4412> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Lower <WG2737> Parts <WG3313> Of The <WG3588> Earth? <WG1093>

He That <WG3588> Descended <WG2597> The Same <WG846> Is <WG2076> Also <WG2532> Who <WG3588> Ascended <WG305> Above <WG5231> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Heavens, <WG3772> That <WG2443> He Might Fill <WG4137> <WG3588> All Things; <WG3956>

And <WG2532> He <WG846> Gave <WG1325> <WG3588> Some <WG3303> Apostles, <WG652> <WG3588> And Some <WG1161> Prophets, <WG4396> <WG3588> And Some <WG1161> Evangelists, <WG2099> <WG3588> And Some <WG1161> Shepherds <WG4166> And <WG2532> Teachers, <WG1320>

With A View To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Perfecting <WG2677> Of The <WG3588> Saints; <WG40> For <WG1519> Work <WG2041> Of The Service, <WG1248> For <WG1519> Building Up <WG3619> Of The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> Of The <WG3588> Christ; <WG5547>

Until <WG3360> We May Arrive <WG2658> <WG3588> All <WG3956> At <WG1519> The <WG3588> Unity <WG1775> Of The <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> And <WG2532> Of The <WG3588> Knowledge <WG1922> Of The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> At <WG1519> A Man <WG435> Full Grown <WG5046> At The <WG1519> Measure <WG3358> Of The Stature <WG2244> Of The <WG3588> Fulness <WG4138> Of The <WG3588> Christ; <WG5547>

That <WG2443> No Longer <WG3371> We May Be <WG5600> Infants, <WG3516> Being Tossed <WG2831> And <WG2532> Carried About <WG4064> By Every <WG3956> Wind <WG417> Of The <WG3588> Teaching <WG1319> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Sleight <WG2940> <WG3588> Of Men, <WG444> In <WG1722> Craftiness <WG3834> With A View To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Systematizing <WG3180> <WG3588> Of Error; <WG4106>

<WG226> But Holding The Truth <WG1161> In <WG1722> Love <WG26> We May Grow Up <WG837> Into <WG1519> Him <WG846> <WG3588> In All Things, <WG3956> Who <WG3739> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Head, <WG2776> The <WG3588> Christ : <WG5547>

From <WG1537> Whom <WG3739> All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Body, <WG4983> Fitted Together <WG4883> And <WG2532> Compacted <WG4822> By <WG1223> Every <WG3956> Joint <WG860> <WG3588> Of Supply <WG2024> ' According To The <WG2596> Working <WG1753> In Its <WG1722> Measure <WG3358> <WG1520> Of Each One <WG1538> Part, <WG3313> The <WG3588> Increase <WG838> Of The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> Makes For Itself <WG4160> To <WG1519> The Building Up <WG3619> Of Itself <WG1438> In <WG1722> Love. <WG26>

This <WG5124> Therefore <WG3767> I Say, <WG3004> And <WG2532> Testify <WG3143> In The <WG1722> Lord, <WG2962> No Longer <WG3371> <WG5209> That Ye Walk <WG4043> Even As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Rest, <WG3062> The Nations, <WG1484> Are Walking <WG4043> In <WG1722> The Vanity <WG3153> <WG3588> <WG3563> Of Their Mind, <WG846>

Being Darkened <WG4654> In The <WG3588> Understanding, <WG1271> Being <WG5607> Alienated From <WG526> The <WG3588> Life <WG2222> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> On Account Of <WG1223> The <WG3588> Ignorance <WG52> Which <WG3588> Is <WG5607> In <WG1722> Them, <WG846> On Account Of <WG1223> The <WG3588> Hardness <WG4457> <WG3588> <WG2588> Of Their Heart, <WG846>

Who <WG3748> Having Cast Off All Feeling, <WG524> Themselves <WG1438> Gave Up <WG3860> To <WG3588> Licentiousness, <WG766> For The <WG1519> Working <WG2039> Of Uncleanness <WG167> All <WG3956> With <WG1722> Craving. <WG4124>
<WG5210> But Ye <WG1161> Not <WG3756> Thus <WG3779> Learned <WG3129> The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547>
If Indeed <WG1489> Him <WG846> Ye Heard <WG191> And <WG2532> In <WG1722> Him <WG846> Were Taught, <WG1321> According As <WG2531> Is <WG2076> The Truth <WG225> In <WG1722> <WG3588> Jesus; <WG2424>

<WG659> For You To Have Put Off <WG5209> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Former <WG4387> Conduct <WG391> The <WG3588> Old <WG3820> Man, <WG444> Which <WG3588> Is Corrupt <WG5351> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Desires <WG1939> <WG3588> Of Deceit; <WG539>
To Be Renewed <WG365> And <WG1161> In The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> <WG3588> <WG3563> Of Your Mind; <WG5216>

And <WG2532> To Have Put On <WG1746> The <WG3588> New <WG2537> Man, <WG444> Which <WG3588> According To <WG2596> God <WG2316> Was Created <WG2936> In <WG1722> Righteousness <WG1343> And <WG2532> Holiness <WG3742> <WG3588> Of Truth. <WG225>

Wherefore <WG1352> Having Put Off <WG659> <WG3588> Falsehood, <WG5579> Speak <WG2980> Truth <WG225> Each <WG1538> With <WG3326> <WG3588> <WG4139> His Neighbour, <WG846> Because <WG3754> We Are <WG2070> Of One Another <WG240> Members. <WG3196>
Be Angry, <WG3710> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Sin; <WG264> The <WG3588> Sun <WG2246> <WG3361> Let Not Set <WG1931> Upon <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG3950> Your Provocation, <WG5216>
Neither <WG3383> Give <WG1325> Place <WG5117> To The <WG3588> Devil. <WG1228>

He That <WG3588> Steals <WG2813> No More <WG3371> Let Him Steal, <WG2813> <WG3123> But Rather <WG1161> Let Him Labour, <WG2872> Working <WG2038> What Is <WG3588> Good <WG18> <WG3588> With His Hands, <WG5495> That <WG2443> He May Have <WG2192> To Impart <WG3330> To Him That <WG3588> Need <WG5532> Has. <WG2192>

Any <WG3956> Word <WG3056> Corrupt <WG4550> Out Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG4750> Your Mouth <WG5216> Not <WG3361> Let Go Forth, <WG1607> ' But <WG235> If <WG1487> Any <WG5100> Good <WG18> For <WG4314> Building Up <WG3619> <WG3588> In Respect Of Need, <WG5532> That <WG2443> It May Give <WG1325> Grace <WG5485> To Them That <WG3588> Hear. <WG191>

And <WG2532> <WG3361> Grieve Not <WG3076> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> The <WG3588> Holy <WG40> <WG3588> Of God, <WG2316> By <WG1722> Which <WG3739> Ye Were Sealed <WG4972> For The <WG1519> Day <WG2250> Of Redemption. <WG629>

All <WG3956> Bitterness, <WG4088> And <WG2532> Indignation, <WG2372> And <WG2532> Wrath, <WG3709> And <WG2532> Clamour, <WG2906> And <WG2532> Evil Speaking <WG988> Let Be Removed <WG142> ' From <WG575> You, <WG5216> With <WG4862> All <WG3956> Malice; <WG2549>

<WG1096> And Be <WG1161> To <WG1519> One Another <WG240> Kind, <WG5543> Tender Hearted, <WG2155> Forgiving <WG5483> Each Other, <WG1438> According As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> <WG3588> God <WG2316> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Forgave <WG5483> You. <WG5213>
